transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Vego wood se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan Vego wood se.
Customer: Mam, main Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Actually mam aapki taraf se na abhi ek feedback aaya tha ki aap satisfied nahi hai services ke regarding. Kya problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan mam. Mam problem ye aa raha hai ki isme nahi to quantity jyada aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur matlab jo hamare product hai uske nahi aa rahi hai dusri kuch aa rahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Aap mujhe bataye aapka minimum order quantity mein kya rehta hai dealing karne ke liye? Quantity to matlab ton mein to rehna chahiye na mam.
Customer: Okay. Ek do ton mein to.
Executive: Kitna bata rahe ho aap?
Customer: Ek do ton mein to hona chahiye na mam.
Executive: Ek ton mein, theek hai. Okay. Aur kya rehta hai aapka expectation?
Customer: Ek ton se upar aapko bheji chahiye hota hai.
Executive: Hello, sunai nahi de raha mam.
Customer: Haan. Main bol rahi hu ek ton se upar aapko chahiye hota hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. Aur kya location kya rehta hai?
Customer: Location hamara Sumerpur, Rajasthan.
Executive: Sirf Rajasthan local area mein dealing karte ho mam aap?
Customer: Jaise Gujarat Gujarat hai aur Rajasthan ye do.
Executive: Gujarat aur Rajasthan mein basically deal karte ho aap?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek second. Abhi mam kuch time pehle Manisha ki aapse baat hui thi. To aap satisfied nahi the unhone jo bhi solution diya ya jo bhi cheeze hui uske regarding?
Customer: Unko bhi maine yahi bola hai just hamare quantity jyada nahi aa rahi hai aur plus hamare jo product hai uske nahi aa rahi hai jaise poha ke vagera itna iska requirement nahi hai but jo khakhra ki hai, masale ki uski to jyada honi chahiye na quantity mein. To uski do kilo aur ek kilo 1 kg mein 200 300 rupees ki hai mam. Ye itna hi bas aa rahi hai usse jyada nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan haan. Yaha pe dikh rahi hai aapke liye. Aapke liye 17 inquiry aa rahi hai lead aa rahi hai to aap usme se 17 to ho bhi nahi paate fir kya hai 1 kilo wale ko thodi call kar sakte hai.
Customer: Exactly exactly aap sahi bol rahe ho mam. Ek baat bataye jaise yaha pe mujhe kuch by lead dikh rahi hai for example ek ye poha ki by lead dikh rahi hai food grains mein jo category mein aata hai. Poha mein itna nahi hoga to chalega hamare aisa kuch nahi hai jyada aapki requirement aayi hui hai.
Customer: Haan par poha mein nahi karna hai humko ye khakhra aur masale mein jyada focus karna hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Poha mein aap dealing nahi karte ho?
Customer: Nahi poha mein itna nahi karna hai humko humko masale mein jaise red chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder in teeno mein aur jaise khakhra mein jo bhi flavors hai usme.
Executive: Actually kya hai na mam kya ho raha hai aap bata rahe ho ki poha mein aap jyada dealing nahi karte to yaha pe generally pata hai kya issue aa raha hai isliye poha ki by leads aapki catalog mein jyada humko dikh rahi hai. Poha ki sabse jyada by leads abhi tak aapne paanch mahine mein consume kari hui hai. Ki hamara na matlab consumption pattern set ho jata hai ki kiski sabse jyada hum by leads consume karte hai. Usi ke basis pe humko sabse jyada by leads show hoti hai.
Customer: Haan but wo pehle dala hua tha lekin abhi hamare jo launch hue khakhre aur masale uski humko jyada usme focus karna hai thoda.
Executive: Theek hai aur inquiries ka bataye mam inquiries ka kaisa flow aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Inquiries jaise lead inquiries abhi to aage se bahut kam aati hai jaise ek din mein ek bhi aa jati hai aur kabhi nahi bhi aati hai aise.
Executive: Okay. Aur jo buyer hote hai wo.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Aur jo buyer hote hai.
Customer: Haan, bataiye aap.
Executive: Feedback raha hai mam aapka. Bol rahi hu abhi tak ka mam kya feedback mil raha hai aapko IndiaMART se?
Customer: Abhi tak itna mila nahi hai mujhe kuch bhi nahi mila hai itna kuch. Itni quantity mein nahi mil rahi hai.
Executive: Buyer kya bolte hai mam?
Customer: Buyer ye bolte hai ki price jyada hai aur just unke matlab door padta hai to transport ka jyada kiraye bhi lagega rent.
Executive: Okay. To ek kaam karte hai aur aap jyada na focus jaise local Gujarat and Rajasthan ka jyada kare kyuki isme Maharashtra ka aa raha hai jyada aur Karnataka Bengaluru ka aa raha hai. Itna door se fir customer ko ye transport ka kiraya fir unko mahanga hi padega na fir unke aas pass ke area mein isme ki saste mein mil jata hai to itna door se thodi koi lega aise.
Executive: Okay, theek hai. Mam ek kaam karti hu aapko ho sake to aap Rajasthan aur Gujarat ka jyada usme karega nahi Maharashtra vagera itna door tak theek hai ek do to baat alag hai isme to Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Telangana ye sab aa raha hai Hyderabad ye sab aa rahe hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai. Aur usme mam. Haan haan. Ek kaam karti hu main main kuch kuch by lead na aapko whatsapp pe share karati hu aapke major products ki. Theek hai? Jaise maine bataya aapko ki jyada by lead hum jisme consume karte hai na uski by lead humko jyada show hoti hai. To ek kaam karti hu ek ton se upar ki by lead main aapko whatsapp pe share karati hu aapke jo relevant products hai unme se. Aap wo by lead ek baar consume karo, theek hai? Aap mujhe unka feedback bataiyega. Aap bolenge feedback sahi aa raha hai mujhe by lead theek hai to us tarah ke humko hum kuch kuch by lead aapko share karate rahenge whatsapp pe. Ye chalega mam?
Customer: Haan jo bhi hai aap karwa do, theek hai.
Executive: Haan main ye kara deti hu. Baki iske alawa to kuch other issue nahi aa raha hai mam?
Customer: Nahi other issue kuch nahi aa raha hai bas quantity kam aa rahi hai aur jo product hai uski jyada focus mere ko khakhra par masale pe karni hai.
Executive: Theek hai main karati hu main kuch by lead aapko share kara deti hu. Jo location location jo hai ye jyada Ahmedabad ya Gujarat Gujarat kya hai aur jo bhi Rajasthan isme hai na jyada door tak ke customer mana hi bolega yaha se.
Executive: Koi problem nahi hai mam main aapke near by locations ki karaungi aur whatsapp pe main apna number aapko share kar de rahi hu Priyanka ke naam se. Theek hai? In case aapko kabhi bhi koi bhi concern aata hai to directly aap mujhe reach out kar sakte ho. Okay?
Customer: Okay aapka naam kya hai mam?
Executive: Priyanka. Mera naam Priyanka ji ji Priyanka.
Customer: Aapka personal number share kar rahe ho?
Executive: Haan haan main whatsapp pe message kar rahi hu aap naam likh ke aap mera number save kar lijiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai okay mam.
Executive: Aur mere liye mam ek feedback aayega aapko mail pe aap please apna feedback zarur share kijiyega.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul theek hai. Thank you.
Executive: Okay welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Quantity of products is less.

- Wants more buyleads for Khakhra and Masala.

- Buyers complain about high prices and transport costs.



Resolution:

- Executive will share buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Will share buyleads for nearby locations.

- Shared personal WhatsApp number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on shared buyleads.

- Customer to share feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, quantity, khakhra, masala, whatsapp
